headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for Hager Coviva devices
footerDisplay: If you have any suggestions, please open an issue on [GitHub](https://github.com/tylerrmit/homebridge-coviva-hager/issues).

name.title: Name
name.description: You shouldn't need to change this.

covivaId.title: Coviva ID
covivaId.description: The Coviva ID that you specified to login to your phone app

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval
pollingInterval.description: Instruct the plugin to poll the API every N seconds to get device updates. Leave this empty or zero to only fetch on request -- the Coviva API should actively keep the plugin up-to-date anyway. Must be 60 or larger. Default 0.

pingInterval.title: Ping Interval
pingInterval.description: Instruct the plugin to send a PING message to Coviva every N seconds, to keep the connection alive.  Must be 5 or larger. Default 60.
